upgrades.title: Frostfire Tormentor
upgrades.description: Summon a frostfire tormentor instead, which additionally has an ice damage burst which freezes for 2 turns

upgrades.title: Ghostfire Tormentor
upgrades.description: Summon a ghostfire tormentor instead, which additionally has a dark damage burst that ignores LoS

title: Dispersion Field
description: Each turn for 7 turns, teleport 3 enemies in a 6 tile radius to random locations

title: Knightly Oath
description: Summon a void, a chaos and a storm knight. Each knight has 90 hp and the caster takes 40 holy damage when a knight dies

upgrades.title: Void Court
upgrades.description: Summon only void knights. Additionally summon a void champion

upgrades.title: Storm Court
upgrades.description: Summon only storm knights. Additionally summon a storm champion

upgrades.title: Chaos Court
upgrades.description: Summon only chaos knights. Additionally summon a chaos champion

title: Toxin Burst
description: Deal {this.damage.poison} poison damage and inflict 20 turn poison on all units in a 4 radius

title: Tocic Spores
description: Summon 2 mushbooms. Mushbooms have 11 hp and a 2 range 1 poison damage attack which poisons for 4 turns. Mushbooms apply 12 turns of poison to targets in melee range on death

upgrades.title: Grey mushboom
upgrades.description: Summon grey mushbooms instead, which apply stun instead of poison

upgrades.title: Red mushboom
upgrades.description: Summon red mushbooms instead, which do not apply poison but deal fire damage

upgrades.title: Glass mushboom
upgrades.description: Summon glass mushbooms instead, which apply glassify instead of poison

title: Amplify Venom
description: For 10 turns, all poisoned enemies lose 100 poison resist

upgrades.title: Spread poison
upgrades.description: Now spreads poison to enemies in radius 2

title: Combust Poison
description: Consume all poison on enemy units to deal fire damage in a 2 radius burst around each affected enemy for 1x poison amount consumed

title: Spider Queen
description: Summon a spider queen which has 96 hp. The queen hatches 4 baby spiders every 12 turns. The baby spiders have 3 hp and mature into giant spiders after 8 turns

upgrades.title: Aether queen
upgrades.description: Summon Aether spiders instead, +2 minion damage

upgrades.title: Steel queen
upgrades.description: Summon Steel spiders instead, +4 minion damage

title: Freeze
description: Freeze the target unit for 5 turns

title: Iceball
description: Deal {this.damage.ice} ice damage in a 2 radius burst. Damaged units are frozen for 3 turns

upgrades.title: Ice crush
upgrades.description: Frozen units hit take physical damage before freezing again

title: Blizzard
description: Create a blizzard with a 4 tile radius. Each turn units in the blizzard take 5 damage and have a 50% chance to freeze. The blizzard lasts 5 turns

title: Frostfire Hydra
description: Summon a stationary frostfire hydra, which has 16 hp, a 9 range 7 fire damage beam attack and a 9 range 7 ice damage beam attack. The hydra lasts 15 turns

title: Storm Burst
description: Deal either ice or lightning damage in a 5 radius burst. Units dealt ice damage are frozen for 3 turns and units dealt lightning damage are stunned for 3 turns

upgrades.title: Cloud nova
upgrades.description: The nova leaves stormclouds and blizzards behind

title: Death Chill
description: Deal {this.damage.dark} dark damage to target each turn for 5 turns. If the target dies during this, deal {this.damage.ice} ice damage to all enemy units in 3 tile radius and freeze them for 5 turns

title: Ice Phoenix
description: Summon a flying ice phoenix with 74 hp, 1 reincarnation and a 4 range 9 ice damage attack. On death the phoenix explodes, dealing 25 ice damage to enemies and granting 2 SH to allies in a 6 tile radius burst

title: Word of Ice
description: All enemies under 50 hp are frozen for 5 turns. Deals {this.damage.ice} ice damage to fire units

title: (Not ingame) Ice Weave
description: Extend all existing freezes by 4 turns

title: Icicle
description: Deal {this.damage.physical} physical damage to the target and {this.damage.ice} ice damage in 1 tile radius of the target

upgrades.title: Freezing
upgrades.description: Freeze the main target for 2 turns

upgrades.title: Harvest
upgrades.description: Whenever a frozen enemy dies to ice damage, regain a charge of Icicle

title: Chill Wind
description: Deal {this.damage.ice} ice damage and inflict freeze for 6 turns on units in a 3 wide line perpendicular to the caster

title: Wall of Ice
description: Summon a line of ice elementals with a length of 3 tiles which last for 15 turns. Ice elementals have 36 hp, 100 ice, 50 physical and -50 fire resist and a 3 range 5 ice damage attack

title: Earthquake
description: Each tile in 7 radius area has a 50% chance to be affected. Units on affected tiles take {this.damage.physical} physical damage and walls on affected tiles are destroyed

title: Searing Seal
description: Gain Seal of Searing for 6 turns. Whenever an enemy takes fire damage, the seal gains that many charges. When the seal expires, it deals charges/5 fire damage to all enemies in LoS. Recasting the seal will activate this effect

title: Purity
description: Cleanse all debuffs on yourself. You cannot be affected by debuffs for 6 turns

title: Twilight Gaze
description: All enemies in LoS lose 50 dark and holy resist. Lasts 10 turns

title: Slime form
description: Become a slime for 8 turns, gaining 100 poison and 50 physical resist. Summon a friendly slime each turn

upgrades.title: Fire Slime
upgrades.description: Equal chance to summon a fire slime instead

upgrades.title: Ice Slime
upgrades.description: Equal chance to summon an ice slime instead

upgrades.title: Void Slime
upgrades.description: Equal chance to summon a void slime instead

title: Blazerip
description: Deal 12 arcane and fire damage in a 7 wide line perpendicular to the caster

title: Ice Vortex
description: All enemy units in 5 tile radius are dealt 11 arcane and ice damage, pulled towards the target and frozen for 2 turns. May only be cast on a frozen target

title: The Restless Dead
description: For 15 turns, whenever a living enemy dies, resurrect it as a skeleton with hp equal to max hp of slain unit and 5 physical damage melee attack

upgrades.title: Junk Golems
upgrades.description: Raise enemy constructs as junk golem

upgrades.title: Elemental Spirits
upgrades.description: Whenever an enemy fire, ice or lightning unit dies, random summoned ally gains 100 resistance to that element and a ranged attack of that type. Each ally can gain only 1 such buff

title: (Not ingame) Gust of Wind
description: Push back units 7 tiles in a cone. If a unit collides with a wall, chasm, or another unit, it is stunned for 3 turns and takes 14 physical damage. Stationary units are not affected. Clears spider webs and weather effects

title: Pyrostatic Curse
description: Curses targets in 4 tile radius for 4 turns. Whenever a cursed target takes fire damage, 2 random enemy units in line of sight of that unit are dealt half that much lightning damage

upgrades.title: Linear conductance
upgrades.description: Redealt lightning damage is dealt as a beam instead

title: Mercurize
description: Afflict the target with Mercurize. The target takes 2 poison and 2 physical damage each turn for 6 turns. If the target dies while cursed, it is raised as a Quicksilver Geist. Geists are flying undead metallic units with many resistances and immunities. The Geist has max HP equal to the cursed unit, and a trample attack dealing 10 damage.

upgrades.title: Morbidity
upgrades.description: Mercurized targets also take dark damage

upgrades.title: Toxic Fumes
upgrades.description: Quicksilver Geists have a noxious aura that deals 1 poison damage to enemy units within 2 tiles each turn.

upgrades.title: Mercurial Vengeance
upgrades.description: When a Quicksilver Geist is killed, its killer is affliected with Mercurize.

title: Magnetize
description: Magnetize target metallic unit. Enemy units within a radius of 4 tiles of the magnetized unit are pulled 1 towards the unit each turn. Afterwards, adjacent enemy units are stunned for 1 turn. Lasts 5 turns

title: Lightning Spire
description: Summon a Lightning Spire. Lightning Spires are stationary metallic constructs with 25 max hp. Each turn, the spire will zap up to 4 enemy units up to 4 tiles away, dealing 6 lightning damage.

upgrades.title: Wall Penetration
upgrades.description: The spires can zap enemies through walls.

upgrades.title: Resistance Penetration
upgrades.description: Zapped units permanently lose 10 lightning resistance.

title: Silver Spear
description: Deals 27 physical damage to the target. Deals 27 holy damage to dark and arcane units within 1 tile away from the projectile's path

title: Siege Golems
description: Summons a crew of 3 siege golems. The siege golems will assemble an inferno cannon, or operate one if it is within 3 tiles. The inferno cannon deals 30 fire damage to units in a 3 tile radius. The cannon will explode when destroyed, dealing 30 fire damage in a 3 tile radius.

title: Spikeball Factory
description: Surrounds the caster with spikeball gates, which will spawn spikeballs. Spikeballs are metallic constructs with 60 HP, 100 lightning, ice, and poison resistance, 50 physical and fire resistance, deal 9 physical damage in a trample attack, and deal 6 physical damage to melee attackers.

upgrades.title: Manufactory
upgrades.description: Surrounds the initially summoned gates with another layer of gates

upgrades.title: Copper Spikeballs
upgrades.description: Summons copper spikeballs instead of normal ones
